forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 69, with temperatures falling to around 65 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 13 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy drizzle after 11pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 58. West southwest wind 7 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
As the sun begins its gentle descent, Downtown San Francisco basks in a golden glow, heralding a pleasantly warm afternoon. The crisp air, freshened by the west southwest winds, carries whispers of ocean brine and the soft rustle of leaves. The forecast hints at a high near 69 degrees, with a gradual retreat into the afternoon, as temperatures drift down to a comfortable 65. While patches of cloud adorn the sky, the overall impression remains clear, with an enticing view towards the Golden Gate and the rolling hills beyond.

As twilight approaches, the city will shroud itself in a veil of mostly cloudy skies. A light drizzle may emerge after the hour of 11, hinting at the soft embrace of evening. With temperatures easing to around 58, it's best to slip into a light jacket or sweater, a perfect companion for those planning a twilight stroll along the Embarcadero or an intimate dinner at a local bistro. Although fog may settle into the bay, obscuring the distant coastline, the allure of the city remains vibrant. Embrace the charm of the evening, perhaps with a warm cup of coffee or a spirited gathering among friends; the essence of this San Francisco day is undoubtedly fleeting but rich in potential.
